diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts of Film Theory.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    FT[Film Theory] --> F[Formalist Theory]
    FT --> R[Realist Theory]
    FT --> A[Auteur Theory]
    FT --> G[Genre Theory]
    FT --> S[Structuralist & Post-structuralist Theory]
    FT --> P[Psychoanalytic Theory]
    FT --> FT2[Feminist Film Theory]
